education.description: I am passionate about using data to draw meaningful conclusions about the growth of a company. I studied Statistics and Applied Mathematics as my majors. I learned SAS and R-software in school, and I have obtained a certificate in Python Data Structures and SQL. I can do data analysis using Microsoft Excel. I enjoy learning new programming languages and expanding my toolkit for data analysis. I have excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a team. I have good time management to help cope with multiple tasks and deadlines. I enjoy gaining insight from data and assisting in the development of actionable solutions and data-driven decisions, which I have noticed your company values as well. After learning Python, I became particularly interested in data science. I'm excited toput SAS to use in a more practical setting. I particularly admire your company's use of predictive analytics to cater to customers' needs instinctively.

phrases.englishPhrase: University Of KwaZulu Natal | Education Data
phrases.foreignLanguage: This learning management system that is akin to UKZN's Moodle website, was gathered from the Kalboard 360.
A mock project of financial analysis using SQL without any data provided.

experience.name: Work Experience
experience.description: Through this programme I have gained new skills including HTML, CSS and JavaScript which have proven to be helpful to me and I am currently working on a project I cannot disclose since it is still in progress which serves as proof of my skills. For some little proof I have attached a URL into my GitHub repostory which will help.
